category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 24-3 (Management and operation of student loan credit guarantee account and scholarship support account)
contents: Article 24-3 (Management and operation of student loan credit guarantee accounts and scholarship support accounts) ① The Foundation manages and operates guarantee accounts and scholarship accounts in accordance with Articles 25 and 36 of the Foundation Act. ② Other guarantee accounts and scholarship accounts. Matters regarding the management and operation of the Foundation Act shall be governed by the Enforcement Decree of the Foundation Act and the provisions of the Minister of Education. Revised 2019. 7. 11., 2020. 11. 5.
